meanings.definition: A unit of currency in the Philippines.
meanings.sent1: In the Philippines, you can buy a snack for one piso.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for piso when I visited Manila.
meanings.sent3: The piso rolled off the table and into the piggy bank.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a thousand piso.
meanings.sent5: The shiny piso coin gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A floor or story of a building.
meanings.sent1: The first piso of the building houses the offices.
meanings.sent2: We took the elevator to the top piso to enjoy the view.
meanings.sent3: The cat loves to nap on the warm piso by the window.
meanings.sent4: His dreams reached the highest piso of success.
meanings.sent5: The piso creaked under the weight of the dancing children.
